department: Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
description: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) has a requirement for the provision of commercially available IT training services for Power BI software.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title
{French: Formation Power BI, English: Power BI Training}

### Reference Number
{French: cb-6451-32199464, English: cb-6451-32199464}

### Solicitation Number
{French: 20222689, English: 20222689}

### Tender Status
{French: Expiré, English: Expired}

### Procurement Category
{French: SRV, English: SRV}

### Notice Type
{French: Demande de propositions, English: Request for Proposal}

### Procurement Method
{French: Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif, English: Competitive - Selective tendering}

### Procurement Description
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions Canada (OSFI) is seeking the provision of commercially available IT training services for Power BI software. The proposed services must be delivered in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender evaluation will be based on a combined assessment of technical merit and price, with the highest combined rating being the criteria for selection.

### Regions of Opportunity
The proposed services are required for delivery across Canada.

### Regions of Delivery
The proposed services are to be delivered in Canada.

### Trade Agreements
The proposed procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is {French: 2023-07-04T14:00:00, English: 2023-07-04T14:00:00}

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:

* Andrew Bryant at:
	+ Email: [contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (343) 571-8507
